T02D2392:22b-0: @22b srang ba ri tstshe dan n'a ma /
T02D2392:22b-2: 'dzag pa gcod pa'i man ngag ces bya ba /
T02D2392:22b-3: yum don grub ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2392:22b-4: rkyen dang rgya mtsho rgyas pa dang //
T02D2392:22b-5: grang pa spyod lam nyes pa ste //
T02D2392:22b-6: kha zas byin rlabs dam tshig gis //
T02D2392:22b-7: grang pa 'dzag ba chu rgyun bzlog / rdo rje'i rked par dar dkar bsgril //
T02D2392:22b-8: dar gyi skud pas dam par bcings //
T02D2392:22b-9: g-yas g-yon ba drag tu sprugs //
T02D2392:22b-10: bsam gtan lte bar gtad par gyis //
T02D2392:22b-11: rnam snang sgo ru sku yig bsgom //
T02D2392:22b-12: rgyun gcod sngags ni zhal nas longs //
T02D2392:22b-13: zla ba rgyas na rgya mtsho lung //
T02D2392:22b-14: kha brag brgyad la chu rgyun 'dzag /
T02D2392:22b-16: mi ltung tshe ring bde ba thob //
T02D2392:22b-17: rdo rje'i spyi bro drag ser bsgom //
T02D2392:22b-18: hr'im hr'im h'um gi thig le 'dra //
T02D2392:22b-19: steng rlung bcings nas zhags pa ltar //
T02D2392:22b-20: g-yas skor g-yon skor rtsa la gram //
T02D2392:22b-21: rgya mtsho grang ba mi yis bsro //
T02D2392:22b-22: bcud len sman gyi sbyor ba bya //
T02D2392:22b-23: aa ru gser mdog 'o mar bskol //
T02D2392:22b-24: tsha ba gsum dang cang zhi bsre //
T02D2392:22b-25: bcud can zas dang sbyar la bza' //
T02D2392:22b-26: na ba'i sa ru mu sdug dang //
T02D2392:22b-27: bem rtol brgya dang rtsa brgyad brgyab //
T02D2392:22b-28: mar bskol ras bal me btsa' gdab //
T02D2392:22b-29: grang 'don bags pa rked la dkri //
T02D2392:22b-30: lha srung log na gdon gyi rkyen //
T02D2392:22b-31: rgya mtsho ma thub 'dzag pa la //
T02D2392:22b-32: rang byung me tog gu gul nag / yungs kar thal ba me klad bsre //
T02D2392:22b-33: ha bu'i sngags bzlas rdo rjer byug / dog pa nag pos bcing par bya //
T02D2392:22b-34: drag po'i spyod lam bzlas byas nas //
T02D2392:22b-35: bum pa'i rlung bcing h'um phat 'dren //
T02D2392:22b-36: rnal 'byor kha zas nyams na ni //
T02D2392:22b-39: dam tshig nyams nas rgyu ba la //
T02D2392:22b-40: mchod dang gtor ma byin rlabs zhu //
T02D2392:22b-41: gzhan du thams cad rnal 'byor la //
T02D2392:22b-42: yod pa dag ni ma yin no //
